content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Maryam Abbasi from Iran. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Duisburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: Greetings, Maryam. While I appreciate your interest in our apartment in Duisburg, let me emphasize that as we discussed earlier, I am only allowed to focus on the rental price aspect of the negotiation. Please share the desired price that you have in mind for renting this apartment, and I'll consider it accordingly. If we reach an agreement, we can proceed with the lease details later.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content:
Thank you for your response, Mr. Schmidt. Considering the excellent location and condition of your apartment, I am hoping to propose a rental price of 550 Euros per month. If you find this acceptable, I would gladly accept the price of [550] Euro! Otherwise, I will continue seeking other options while keeping this apartment in mind if adjustments occur.

Now let's see if Mr. Schmidt agrees with this suggested price or not. If he accepts it, we'll terminate the negotiation successfully. If not, we may need to consider revising our offer based on his feedback.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: IGMightily displeased with the proposed rental price of 550 Euros, but willing to negotiate further to maintain an occupied property. However, if Maryam insists on this figure, I don't want to continue the negotiation, because she underestimates the true value of this desirable apartment in the city center. If she reconsiders and increases her offer, we can discuss further.TERMINATE
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
